title: What are your favorite sounds in league?
body:
Mine include {{champion:4}} {{champion:38}}  auto attacks, {{champion:48}} chomp, and everything {{champion:432}} .
I'd Like to hear what everyone else loves to hear during a match :D
https://67.media.tumblr.com/661a2d0491879af8a03402bccee55e49/tumblr_nkrg1s9gnf1raur77o1_500.gif

replies.body:
{{champion:421}} 
#"SKREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE"

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/b/b1/RekSai.R1.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20150214025537

There ya go

I'm 260k deep into her, and I still get goosebumps from that every freaking time. I've probably heard it thousands of times and still. God that's a beautiful sound.
It's the sound of you not being alone in the jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ybOoKtBw,comment-id=000f0001,timestamp=2016-07-22T10:22:45.360+0000)
>
> It's the sound of you not being alone in _her_ jungle.

ftfy

Ahri's death sound ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/25/Ahri.dying1.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20130829033543
Heard the japanese version. Actually got removed from youtube due to sexual content O_o
How bad was it?

Actually I just found it (it apparently got put back after they realized how silly it was to remove it :p) :

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VYpqmJCJZTk

It's... saucy to say the least. **WARNING**: put in headphones and keep the volume low, someone made the mistake of listening to this in public without headphones... He said he got some weird looks O_o
I am extremely uncomfortable now
It probably sounds more normal in Japan... well, at least as normal as the english Ahri  sounds for us .__.

Baron Back, hands down.

Also Kindred's autos. Utora kicked ass on those.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ux7AotP9nyg https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i1kAp3C-Jv0

Oh thats a great one, VERY satisfying. 

I'm sure theres a techinical / engineering method to achieve such satisfying sounds. It has to be something on the subconscious level that makes us say WOW this sound is cool, or this sound is meh. So you sound guys have probably studied hard and scientifically determined how to make the best sounds .... right? 

But yeh some sounds send shivers down my spine or puts a huge GRIN on my face. I urge you guys to make all ULTS sound distinctive and satisfying to use. Basic abilities can maintain their mundane audio, but i think ALL ults should have some sick/ spectacular sound effects that raise some sort of emotion.

Obviously I have no idea how any of this sound production work. I'm assuming you guys have a foley team that makes sounds with a baloon or something, amiright?

Confirmed. All sounds are made from balloons. And thanks! The sound designers on league are _constantly_ talking about how to make sounds for champs and skins iconic. The whole team remembers the sounds of games when we were younger and it's such a huge privilege to be in the position of creating those aural blueprints for others.

But trust me, no sound is mundane. Even something as commonplace as tonality or texture of a sound is often informed by where the champ is from.

That's really cool man, sounds like you love your job eh ? Your team should release some sort of feature next time you guys release something, so we know how this process works. From conception to design to actually making and editing the sounds.

I think this would be a fun thing that the community would love.

Something like this for example

http://m.youtube.com/watch?v=mKa4A-oas74

90% of it would be us strategizing how to get out of Bronze...

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Must be awesome being able to talk to the person who made your favorite sound effect. Also, patting them on the back.
He's a beast. Get ready for his next, KLED!!!

Stop. I can only get this hard. This kled, though he is a filthy inferior yordle, has got me pretty psyched. 

And it's only because of his mount..... fk that rengar cosplaying midget... GAH please you guys have yet to make a cool yordle. Or even one I can play without having to mute their voices. 
Have you ever heard of chromie or brighteings voiceovers from heroes ? Yeh your yordles are almost as annoying.

Hopefully I can mute his voiceover if it's too over the top and cheerful like the rest of his race.

No hate that's just my honest opinions on yordles. Disgusting cheerful and boring. Lizards are cool (blooded) doe
Let's just say I don't ever see a future  a Heartseeker Kled skin...

That announcer yelling "Pentakill" especially if I'm the one she's announcing for. Though not when it's for my opponent. 

More seriously I enjoy listening to explosions especially Ziggs and Jhin.
I like "An enemy is godlike". It's not a good thing to hear, but the way she says it omg.
Not during the match, but mine is definitely the **Play Button** sound
{{champion:136}} : Boop.
Easily the most triggering noise for me. They just slowly rotate into you and sloowwly kill you lol
Jhin's Ult music. Nothing can top it for me.
Arcade and DJ {{champion:37}}  sounds... <3

Regarding DJ Sona, the Reds making that skin had a rather clear view on what they consider important in life...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EaNuuA6hJGQ

Mordekaiser's ultimate.

I love his yell, the eerie laughter and the booming sound it makes.

His Third Q BONK comes close though.
The sound of a Talon ult ending, when the blades shoot together, and the chord that's played when Jhin ults.
Gangplanks ult in the distance...the sound of cannons pounding the earth making a fresh cemetery.

Personal favorites:

{{champion:104}}, {{champion:238}}, {{champion:98}} auto attacks - so satisfying, love farming with them

{{champion:56}} - in my opinion one of the few abilities in the game that truly deserves the "ultimate" title. when you hit that R key and get that big booming DAAARRRRKNNESSSSS you know everything is about to pop off

{{champion:82}} q...
{{champion:82}} Q...
{{champion:82}} Q!!!
That Violin playing whenever Jhin ults
{{champion:202}} 's music that plays at the start of the game.

{{champion:202}} the music that plays during his ult (and the music he has at the start of the game)

{{champion:41}} the sound of cannons firing in the distance

{{champion:30}} everything about this is ult is satisfying

{{champion:245}} the explosion from his ult

{{champion:78}} charging her ult

{{champion:222}} all the sounds of her ult (firing/travelling/exploding)

and the best:

{{champion:99}} laugh
Yes! I love it when Jhin hums along with the in game music. Wish he did it more often...
Nunu bot's laugh. --cancer intensifies--
{{champion:81}} The ult sound

#Since i'm a Morgana main, obligatory Morgana sound pack:

1. Sound of her Q flying and hitting a target
2. The sound of her Black Shield not giving a damn about CC
3. The sound of her ult on her Ghost Bride skin, because rattling chains tightening them when it's close to popping is so satisfying to hear.
4. Her recall animation and sound on Ghost Bride skin. Just creepy but music to my ears.

######I entirely get off from hearing my opponents suffer and i don't care.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} 

---

_**Second place goes to squeaky sounds and balloon plop sounds**_ - Pool Party skins, Fiora's W noodle sword squeak, her R balloon pop squeak, Surprise Party Foddle's Dark Wind balloon animal squeak on bounce. Can't forget that party whistle on his Fear tho.

_**Third place goes to**_ Draven's Gladiator Recall sound of a crowd cheering for him in the arena and his passive sound. I don't play Draven but he's a pretty fun champion to watch be played.

Blackfrost {{champion:34}}'s Ult
{{champion:136}} His Q and W's SFX
{{champion:41}}'s laugh when he ults
{{champion:9}}'s Laugh
{{champion:55}}'s W and Ult
{{champion:127}}'s everything
{{champion:98}} his voice in general and ult
{{champion:143}}'s voice in general as well

{{champion:421}} 's /taunt (the scream) always gave me shivers. It's not your usual "Haha, you suck."

More of a "You fucked up and now you're gonna die painfully."

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=47D2cxIm-oE

DRAAAVEEEN.
I love the sound of kogmaws throwing up because I know someone is raging trying to reach his squishy body before they die.
{{champion:136}} Boop
2.5 attack speed on Bard. Hands down the funniest thing I have ever laid my eyes/ears upon.
all the music background in Jhin's VO and ult
Valor's old auto attacks + Skystrike... most satisfying audial feedback ever.
I really like the little whoosh noises on Runaan's Hurricane. {{item:3085}}
